Reviews.Title: What I thought it would be.
Reviews.Author: C. Arnold "Multimedia shtick"
Reviews.Content: This balun can use all of the 8 wires; four on two pair posts on either side of housing [sound and ptz control]. The power adaptor is removable so you can not have the wrong end in your hand if you start with the one the power adaptor is in! Looks rugged enough. Have not yet tested as I am still looking at PTZ devices, when I test I will report back.

ProductInfo.Features:
Transmission distance: 2000ft MAX.
Cable for RJ-45: Twisted pair CAT5
Type: Connector - VIDEO BALUN/ BNC to RJ-45
Audio: 2 screw-mount. Video: 2 screw-mount
Quantity in Box: 2 pcs
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Male BNC to RJ45 Video Balun with Power Connector (1 pair) for Security Surveillance CCTV Cameras and DVRs
